name: Pingu Adventure: The quest of paradise
name_original: Pingu Adventure: The quest of paradise
description: Pingu Adventure: Quest for Heaven is a platform type game where the objective is to reach the end of each level without dying. The peculiarity of this game is that the main character is Pingu, a seal with supernatural intelligence. Pingu crosses different worlds during his journey to heaven to seek out Pinguette, his childhood friend who left to seek the royal crown.
